Rating Overrides

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe the rating override process
« Use PolicyCenter to override the rating ona
policy transaction

| Defining rating overrides fa

Rating Analyst What is a rating override and what is it
used for in PolicyCenter?

Rating overrides allow you to Julia

manually override the premium Pee ner Ne
that the rating engine

automatically generates for a
policy. Rating overrides are
also referred to as manual
rating in the insurance
industry.

!

| When to apply overrides fa

: The user cannot enter any overrides without
Fists rating a policy first.

Julia

may apply overrides where overrides are

| After viewing the results from a quote, the user
allowed.

| Rating overrides

Override costs ad 5
ae and rerate rl &

Quote Rating Engine selects a Rate Book The Rating Engine calls a Rate Routine for
the Cost Item (for example, a Coverage)

‘yy
New premium results in Quote screen =

Return to the calling policy transaction (Quote) G

Constructs the corresponding
Worksheet with the calculated results

| Review: How are costs handled in PolicyCenter? i

¢ The cost is an entity in PolicyCenter

¢ The cost stores several details
related to rating a policy

« Base rate (BaseRate)

« Adjusted rate (AdjRate)

* Basis(Basis)

* Pro rata factor (ProrataFactor)
* Term amount (TermAmount)

« Amount(Amount)

| What can you override?

¢ Base rate and adjusted rate
¢ Un-prorated amount term amount
* Prorated flat cost

| What lines of business allow rating overrides?

o,
oS

>

commercial

workers inland marine
property

compensation

| What cannot be overridden?

« Rating overrides are not appropriate
for certain types of cost

* Overrides can be disabled for these
costs

¢ Examples
* Tax calculations

« Experience modifiers
* Schedule credits

| Costs and rating overrides (developers) fa

Base rate StandardBaseRate OverrideBaseRate ActualBaseRate
Adjusted rate StandardAdjustedRate OverrideAdjustedRate ActualAdjustedRate
Term Amount StandardTermAmount OverrideTermAmount ActualTermAmount
Amount StandardAmount OverrideAmount ActualAmount

* Overriding a rate results in specific properties being set for a cost entity

¢ Each cost has its own base rate, adjusted rate, term amount and amount
columns

¢ See PolicyCenter documentation for implementation details

| What permissions are available for rating overrides? [5
Permission “Description == Code Example

Edit rate and premium Edit or delete override _editratingoverrides Underwriter
overrides on the Rating Override only
screen; rerate policy
View rate and View Rating Override viewratingoverrides Underwriters
premium overrides screen and policy
managers only
Quote with rate and Quote policy with quotewithrateandpremiumoverrides Underwriters
premium overrides overrides and bypass and most
referring to an producers

underwriter

| Rating overrides across policy transactions Gi

¢ Rating overrides can be entered in
any PolicyCenter jobs, set for a policy
period and preserved for future jobs

* Overrides are not preserved during:

egR

+ Reinstatement: when overridden costs
occur after a cancellation date

+ Rewrite: If the overridden costs are
effective after or before the copied date

« Renewal: Overrides from a previous
policy term are copied to the renewal job
and a referral reason is created for an
underwriter, who decides if the override
continues

| Demonstration G

Using rating overrides

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

,— — When can rating be overridden?
¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

_— — When can rating be overridden?

¢
oe After obtaining a quote from the rating engine, rates and amounts can be overridden

and the policy is rated again.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Gi
